attributes.action: GET CLYDEBANK COLLEGE TO RUN HND 2ND YEAR COURSE`S
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: CLYDEBANK COLLEGE ARE NOT RUNNING 2ND YEAR COURSES IN HND COURSE`S BUSINESS AND ARE WANTING ALL STUDENTS TO MOVE COLLEGE. CLYDEBANK IS A COMMUNITY COLLEGE AND HAS A LONG HISTORY OF RUNNING THESE COURSES AND THE BOARD SHOULD LOOK AT THE NEED FOR THE COURSE AND NOT THE MONEY

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
